product_name: Anastasia Beverly HillsGlow Seeker Powder Highlighter
summary: SummaryHighlightsCruelty FreeThis multi-dimensional illuminating powder achieves the perfect glow and has an ultra-smooth formula for seamless blending and buildable intensity. The highlighter delivers single-sweep luminosity, while the ultra-reflective powder formula gives the effect of a liquid for lit from within radiance.
details: DetailsFeaturesUltra-smooth formula with seamless blending and buildable intensityUniversal shade delivers single-sweep luminosityUltra-reflective powder formula gives the effect of a liquid for lit from within radianceEasy-to-apply and can be used on the face, eyes and bodyDesign of the press allows for the brush to pick up the perfect amount of productCan be used dry or wetFormulated without talc, fragrance, and parabensItem 2615256How To UseGently sweep A23 Pro Brush across Glow Seeker Highlighter to pick up product. Apply Glow Seeker Highlighter onto all areas you want to accentuate, such as the upper cheekbones, bridge and tip of the nose, cupid's bow and collarbone. For mega-shine, layer for desired intensity. Pro Tips: Use the flat side of A23 Pro Brush to deposit product and the tip of the brush to blend edges. Spritz A23 Pro Brush with Dewy Set Setting Spray to turn up your glow with a more intense finish. Apply Glow Seeker Highlighter to the eyes for a radiant look.  IngredientsMica, Cetearyl Ethylhexanoate, Hdi/Trimethylol Hexyllactone Crosspolymer, Calcium Aluminum Borosilicate, Glycerin, Polysorbate 20, Caprylyl Glycol, Squalane, Ethylhexylglycerin, 1,2-Hexanediol, Pentaerythrityl Tetra-Di-T-Butyl Hydroxyhydrocinnamate, Chondrus Crispus Extract, Octyldodecyl Stearoyl Stearate, Xanthan Gum, Silica, Dicalcium Phosphate, Synthetic Fluorphlogopite, Tin Oxide, Tocoperol, Titanium Dioxide (CI 77891), Iron Oxides (CI 77491)Shipping & Coupon RestrictionsThis brand is excluded from most Ulta Beauty coupons.See brand eligibility details
how_to_use: Gently sweep A23 Pro Brush across Glow Seeker Highlighter to pick up product. Apply Glow Seeker Highlighter onto all areas you want to accentuate, such as the upper cheekbones, bridge and tip of the nose, cupid's bow and collarbone. For mega-shine, layer for desired intensity. Pro Tips: Use the flat side of A23 Pro Brush to deposit product and the tip of the brush to blend edges. Spritz A23 Pro Brush with Dewy Set Setting Spray to turn up your glow with a more intense finish. Apply Glow Seeker Highlighter to the eyes for a radiant look.

reviews.headline: I love this
reviews.comments: It gives a natural glow. I use it as a bronzer, I have enchanted, it will not act as a bronzer but a highlighter but you can use it of you are looking for a glow.

reviews.headline: Finally!
reviews.comments: I was a fan of Amrezy highlighter as soon as it hit the market. And I was shocked when the company has discontinued it. But this new product is a fantastic replacement of the original one. It is so easy to apply, it gives just the right amount of shimmer, and it compliments my skin tone. The packaging is beautiful as well, and that always a plus.

reviews.headline: Beautiful glow but don't expect a 2016 SHINE
reviews.comments: Its a gorgeous highlighter but it does look more natural/dewy on the skin (which is what i wanted!) huge too so I will likely have this baby forever

reviews.headline: Beautiful Glow
reviews.comments: I don't have the best luck with highlighters. Usually the color feels off against my skin, it basically disappears completely, or the shimmer is too chunky for my liking. This one I actually love. The color works well for my skin undertone (medium deep olive), it gives a beautiful glow without using shimmer with larger particles. It just looks really nice on my skin.

reviews.headline: GORGEOUS
reviews.comments: i loveeeee this highlighter! I use it as eyeshadow and it is just such a magical gold shimmer, it almost looks wet on the eyes. Absolutely stunning. (I bought the color ethereal)

reviews.headline: Beautiful
reviews.comments: It's the packaging for me

reviews.headline: shade etheral
reviews.comments: well, another return! chunky glitter! ABH is in their downfall era.
Could have gotten the dupe that works just the same but the packaging is so cute and it gets the job done cannot go wrong!

reviews.headline: Okay
reviews.comments: Package breaks easily and product is very yellow toned- id say it would only work well if you had tanned warm toned skin. Lasts forever though,

reviews.headline: Long lasting!
reviews.comments: It's beautiful and last all day!

reviews.headline: new favorite!!!
reviews.comments: i never wear highlighter because i usually find it to be too much or look blatantly obvious i was wearing it. this highlighter is wonderful because its very buildable and it blends into the skin gorgeously. the color is also beautiful as it isnt white and patchy, it's more of a light gold color giving a more natural look while also still shining. i would definitely recommend because i can use it everyday or full glam looks!

reviews.headline: Beautiful Highlighter
reviews.comments: I absolutely wanted to try this new highlighter out, once it was released. This shade is stunning, and noticeable. The only downside is you have to add more to keep the highlighter noticeable. The price is a little much, but it will last you a long time!

reviews.headline: Not a Wowzer… to me!
reviews.comments: I'm still trying and testing this… not a total "dud"… but I'm not impressed at alll! There are lots of great highlighters out there. Especially from ABH, and at this price point, I expect a lot. I've tried this dry, tried spritzing my skin first, tried it under, and over my foundation… I've tried different application tools from different brushes to my fingers… but I just can't seem to get any real "pay off" from this. For the record - I'm a medium to medium tan, neutral skin tone.

reviews.headline: Perfect
reviews.comments: Awesome color, formula and effect. Its my everyday highlight - totally recommend. I have fair skin thats textured and it's just perfect.

reviews.headline: Too Dark
reviews.comments:
This highlight was too dark and golden for my fair skin toneGlittery. It has been compared to the Amrezy highlighter multiple times on YouTube, but I dont think they are very similar on my skin tone. 

Looking forward to purchasing a lighter shade in this formula once there is one released in the US.

reviews.headline: Amazing as Always!!
reviews.comments: Bought this for a Christmas gift to myself and I was not disappointed, so shimmery and goes on like butter. I absolutely will be buying again!

reviews.headline: Absolutely Gorgeous Highlighter
reviews.comments: This highlighter is gorgeous. The shade is easy to blend & a little goes a long way! It's perfect for the fall and winter!

reviews.headline: Beautiful highlighter
reviews.comments: My favorite highlighter by far. It gives a beautiful natural glow.

reviews.headline: Absolutely Beautiful!!
reviews.comments: The last time I had a highlighter this amazing was their Amreazy hifhlighter years ago. This applies and blends so easiky, it gives the softest glow and not streaky.

reviews.headline: Amrezy dupe!!!
reviews.comments: I am a die hard for the Amrezy highlighter colab with abh, mine is def expired but im scrapping the plan bc its the ONLY highlighter that i love. Its a beautiful color, is just enough of a sheen but you can build it up for more of a dramatic highlight, it doesnt highlight or emphasize texture or fine lines.  This product is just a repackaged version of that and for that im grateful!

faceoff_positive.comments: I bought this for my prom photos because it looked natural whilst also being glowy. It was perfect! It was extremely glowy without being overly glittery as well as lasted the entire night. This is my new favorite highlighter because it is so versatile since you can build how intense you want the highlight to be! My new favorite, 10/10 recommend!!
faceoff_positive.headline: My new favorite!

faceoff_negative.comments: So beautiful but you need another shade for paler skin tones. It's too gold for my fair skin!
faceoff_negative.headline: Need more shades!
